reviews.review_text: I went to McDonalds Still Creek yesterday at around 16:30. It s a nice place with very easy parking. Staff are kind and very professional, service is great! I also noticed that the Drive through is fast as well. Food : 2/5 |

When I took my first sip of the iced coffee that I purchased for $1 it washed away all negative memories of my gambling sessions and all the chicanery that is employed to extract money from me. This iced drink provides me with so much upside while putting down very little capital. Thanks you, I will not be clown shoed again
Whoever packed my order took the time to write a note about my iced coffee and I really appreciated the service!

I dont go to McDonalds very often but this one is my favourite. Very clean, spacious dining area both inside and outside and really fast-paced! My favourite items here are hash browns and chicken MacGuffin. Smoothies are good too especially the ones with mango and pineapple.

I really like sitting on the upper floor with my food. Its has plenty of space to dine in with different table options. It has a separate play place where my kids can play while I am having my coffee. They also have refill station upstairs and Washrooms, accessible washroom is downstairs. They have a separate room for Kids party, I saw birthday decorations and cake one time. It has a lot of parking as well.

As much as I feel empathetic towards the crew members that work here, it s just too busy when you re close to the BCIT on weekdays. Otherwise, the production team is doing amazing. The service is great, the food is decent. Thank you McDonald s.

Mic-ie D so fast so good this location is so big and has been here forever I used to go to this location with my dad when I was little. The place has not changed since I was a kid. Recommendation = Fries + ice cream.       +
$4 combo deal for bacon and egg mcmuffin and medium coffee

This location is big in two floor and has patio seating Relatively clean Staff are kind and understanding. I had some issues with McDonalds app, they helped me with that and actually offered free Coke, fries and one shake to make me happy Convenient parking location and kids play also provided but closed due to Covid

This meal had me feeling like I I I m in the stars tonight. This is getting heavy Can you hear the bass boom? Im ready (woo hoo) Life is sweet as honey Yeah, this beat cha-ching like money, huh Disco overload, Im into that, Im good to go Im diamond, you know I glow up Hey, so lets go. So cheesy BTS joke aside the sauces were actually really good! Substituted the coke that s part of the meal for a coffee Frappuccino and it was very good overall. Staff at the drive through were friendly and efficient. No complaints at all.

McDs is our summer go to.  Got lemonade, kid played in the play area, A/C, inflation friendly if youre ordering off the value menu and use app promos. Only critique is the parking could be scarce depending on the time of day but thats about it. Kid-friendliness: Theres a play place which is partially separated in the upper floor.  Well decorated, very vibrant.  Remember to bring socks.
The best fast food. Quick service with a smile. One of the greatest franchises on earth. The outlet at Still Creek is my favourite! Always get my orders correct and friendly/polite!
One of the coolest McDonalds ever! Lots of bright windows and the place was very clean. Good job staff :)
Great food here. Everything was hot when we received, the restaurant was clean and food tasted great. Didnt have to wait long, and the kids were happy.

I and 3 others just wanted a snack so my oder just z cheese burgers extra pickle, onion, and ketchup, mustard .. Now I know this is small but its what I wanted and for the extra.. Non existent..  Basically now when I get the food I check everything before I leave.
The manager on shift tonight was so kind to us. I wish I had gotten his name but he was wonderful.
Food was excellent and the service is always prompt, friendly. Great place to eat.

This is the best McDonalds i have been to for a very long time. Very quick service the line moved so smooth, food was fresh and hot, order was correct and staff was very friendly. Store front kept very clean.

I had prejudice against McDonalds before until their restaurants changed for good. Every McDonalds now is top notch. Clean, modern...its a pleasure to pass by. A&W and Wendys restaurant  need to start working.
Beautiful and gracefully place for coffee, breakfast. I come here two or three times a week with my wife and friends   . Thanks!
Large popular location with tons of seating. Fully app supported where you can order from your car or from any table you pick. Consistent flavor like what you would expect from any McDonald s.
You guys made my night. And everything was delicious
This is a great location. Standard fast food and ok service but a great location.

Yesterday morning was quite stressful for McD HQ. It seems as they were having computer/ticket printer issues causing anxious diners to inquire on their order. Glad to witness the miss with the colorful hair still prioritized to help an elderly and his order of five hot beverages to his car. A tip of the cap towards the staff!
Im really sad to get this mcmuffin. Some parts are burned. This muffin is so hard as plastic. I can eat that without muffins. Unfortunately, I got two Mcmuffin... Guess what next happens.
Best McDonalds Ive been to. great juicy pattys
One of the best MacDonald in lower mainland, I believe this location is one of their staff training center Kid-friendliness: Kids friendly

Great quick and efficient drive though. Its also good that its close to Freeway and Lougheed Highway so its easy to get back on your traveling route. It can be tricky getting in or out of parking lot. If dinning in can be busy with long wait times.

Nice clean McDonalds.  Very busy location and they do a remarkable job keeping things moving.  Always fresh and golden fries. The parking lot tends to get flooded during rain storms. Lots of seating area.  The ordering and waiting area is too small for the volume they do.  The upstairs area is a good spot to enjoy your McDonalds.
It is good place to stay for relax.

I dont mean the quality is bad but the size. That apply to all McDonalds. Food is not worth. I only buy coffee but coffee quality is not stable. Other McDonalds are the same. Sometimes, I got just brown water without any coffee taste.

Come here pretty regularly. Drive thru service is always quick. Prices on some items are a little cheaper than some of the other Mcd restaurants in the area. Never had an issue with curbside pickup either. The dining-in experience is above average compared to other locations. I have come here for years, and plan to continue for years to come

Did not grab her name but the lady that was working today around 12-1P, who was particularily stocking the straws, lids, and cleaning the trays deserves a lot more credit and appreciation than people show her. Yes, its simple tasks but a task / role that many overlook, perhaps including this company itself. As shes most likely just another sin number on a piece of paper to most. In truths, its because its a simple task and many consider it needy and the right / entitlement to neglect her and her position. As a senior manager myself, I see value in her role. The task itself becomes challenging as it is all about repitions day in day out. If everyone could do this, they already wouldve. The times I frequent this establishment while shes away or after her shift, the condiments etc are always EMPTY. Thank you for hiring her so us customer can constantly have straws, lids, condiments at our disposal. A little goes a long. Hope this translates / transpires into a wage increase for her. I will be acknowledging her that Ive left this review to have her be recognize. You store managers should do the same.
How it looks like during COVID-19 in the dinning area.
Huge seating area including second floor with play area. Amazing kids loved it Food : 5/5
Busy and good place to drink coffee. It has nice parking place to park your car.

This McDonalds has the best night drive thru in the world! The server is hilarious, engaging, prompt and Im pretty sure he threw in a heel click with glee when he ran outside to deliver my food. Thanks dude for brightening my evening!

This is one of the better McDonald s with a really nice large dine-in area on the second floor and clean washrooms (with no weird people squatting the booths). It s a little out of the way and only accessible by driving probably

McDonald s has been really proactive with COVID-19 safety. Prior to the pandemic their restaurants were among the cleanest fast food places. Now they are even cleaner. The food is predictable and the coffee is really quite good.

Depending on the staff that are on shift, this McDonalds gives me faith in humanity. The food is always fresh here and usually really good. Havent messed up my order yet. The people taking your order arent brick walls. Never had an unreasonable wait here. Overall a stellar example of what all McDonalds should aspire to be.

This location is the best. Heard it was the head office (in BC? Not sure). There are some staff members who aren t very considerate listeners when it comes to customers with accents or lower English language proficiency (my folks have been felt shunned for their English... luckily for them, I wasn t there ), but most of the times the staff there are friendly. They are cool with giving condiments (as some places will charge you), and their second floor area is a lovely place to sit and just chill.  Parking is free, but watch-out as some lots are now designated for other businesses there.
I dropped my ice cream but they gave a replacement one! Great customer service at this location.

Good McDonalds location. The servers are really nice, and the food comes out really quickly. Well organized, and very clean. I havent had any problems with this one. The food is very well made, for McDonalds quality.

This is probably one of the largest McDonalds Ive ever visit. It has two stories and LOTS of seats. Food came real quick and we enjoyed the stay. Though it is not that convenient to visit if you dont have a car, but you can pretty much enjoy McDonalds anywhere else too.
Makes me feel good to be here. The staffs are peppy and upbeat. Never had a wrong order. The whole system is like a well oiled machine. Good job! I always love coming here instead of other McDonalds.

Great, clean restaurant that is one of the most elegant McDonalds restaurant Ive been so far. It doesnt really look like a fast food chain from the outside, ample parking and drive thru service is fast as well. There are mobile app parking stalls as well if you are in a hurry to get food.
Was there at 12:30 on Thursday, during lunch Rush, the Lady on Till was amazing, taking drive through orders, running for her self and giving every customer the best service.
This is one time they didnt screw up our order. Are they getting better? Only time will tell.
Had an issue with a mobile order and they resolved it quickly and even gave me the sandwiches for free since something went wrong on the app end. Their manager was helpful and very friendly.
Friendly and timely service. We came in ordered something like 8 breakfast burger and sides and the staff were patient and attentive. Would definitely come again of I am in the area.

Went too this location for lunch, lady was at the door only letting a few people order at a time the ketchup pumps were also taken away. Really nice bike path/paved trail right across from this mc donalds.

Located in a calm area in North Burnaby, this Mc Donalds has lots of space for parking, online pick-ups, accessible park spots, short lines for the drive-thru and a great view if you want to dine-in in the mezzanine. Its my favorite Mc Donalds in the region, by far.

Updated: January 13, 2019 I had the pleasure of dealing with Sarah the manager. She was fantastic and has earned a 5 star review Old:It s rarely up to par here. Just sad because it s head office. This his always been drive thru servive. I did go in once. It s super nice inside, tv, upstairs lounge fireplace. Nice stuff.

Surinder in the drive thru is always a delight. She takes my order promptly, professionally and with a smile. After paying for my morning coffee her words of  thank you dear  always starts my day on a positive note. Give that woman a raise!

McDonalds is trying a new system. Today, we went to the McDonalds on Willingdon, near the freeway. We ordered and were given a disc to take to a table that allowed a staff member to find our table and bring our food to us. After our food arrived, a staff member followed up to be sure everything was fine. It was nice to not have to hang around in the ordering area, waiting for our food.
Kudos to the Manager/Supervisor of this branch for finding my wallet that I left on the couch! I am so thankful she found it and kept it in a safe place!
Best McDonalds Ive been in. Above average service, personable staff, very clean restaurant, food was exactly to order, hot and fresh. A refreshing experience, thank you!
Hi, our recent visit proved to be worthy, fries were perfect and so was my filet o fish.

Ordered a pot of coffee muffins and danishes werent ready waiting waiting and waiting make me late for work this is the new online ordering and pickup service not sure when its going to be a good hopefully McDonalds respond by a couple extra muffins while I wait here..... well went back that day an they gave me full refund just what I wanted ... went and tried it the next day and it was way better thanks McD s good job

The Mcdonalds headquarters for Canada I think. Service is always fast and quality of food pretty much the peak of what you can get from McDonalds. It would make sense as this is where corporate eyes are always watching and people are training to the McDonalds Gold Standard. Great place to hang out while waiting for car-related stuff at the nearby dealerships.
Charlotte is the best. Very kind and amazing customer service. She deserves a promotion.
5/5. Classic. Timeless. Reliable. McDonalds never disappoints be it breakfast, lunch, dinner or an illicit but desperately necessary 11pm stroll through the drivethrough. Cant go wrong.
Rated in the drive through, easy, quick and efficient. No comment on the food, its what you would expect. Vegetarian options: Sold options Parking: Lots of room

This is the best McDonalds experience in the area. Large restaurant with upstairs and outdoor seating. Music plays throughout (outside too, theres even a fireplace outside to keep you warm!) I also appreciate the 24/7 service.

The service is like all Mcdicks, hit or miss, mostly hit. The restaurant however is freaking awesome, its huge, if you stay downstairs you may think it sucks but once you go upstairs there is always sitting space and they have tvs upstairs too. On the downside as an adult with no kids, they also have a whole playground upstairs and sometimes the kids are loud, but overall, this Macdonald is a nice one to go to.
Great location, good number of parking spots available. Staff are friendly and service is reasonably fast. I never have trouble finding a spot to eat even during the busiest hours.
This MacDonalds has one of the best environments in Vancouver. The outside patio has a good open view of the surrounding landscaping. The inside has a fireplace and lots of natural light.
They made my sandwich quick and it tasted great, better than normal mcdonalds. I tried the chicken mcgriddle and it was blessed. Definitely reccomend it. I put lettuce and mayo on mine.
A great place to grab a meal. Our order was correct, hot and tasted great. The Staff were very friendly and quick to accommodate our requests. Thanks McDs
Real good service. The staff were most excellent.!  The manager actually made me smile. And was uplifting. I hope you go places Sir..   thank-you for all Ure kindness i really needed it today..!
Like any other McDonalds. Drive thru staff were really friendly. Fast service.
Flagship store, at least when it opened. Quick, efficient with friendly and very well trained staff. Food also finest McQuality.
This McDonalds is nicely maintained and clean.  Food is typical McDonalds, its ok and not bad.  There are plenty of sitting spaces.  They even deliver the good to your table.
Still Creek Dr. Is THE  BEST  McDonalds to order from , great crew always follow instructions and food is amazing. These people ROCK !!! Keep up the great work. Cheers
My son loves their newly renovated play area!   Service was great!  They didnt get mad at me for order a burger with mobile service.  :-P

Great Mc Donalds location. Clean, spacious, 2 floors with a kids play area in the top floor.  Friendly staff. Meal was tasty and fresh, complying with the high-quality standards of the Mc Donalds chain. My kids love that place.
Always got my orders right and drive thru most time faster then inside. Clean and large sitting area.

The staff here work fast to clear the line and food deliver out on time, the dinning area is comfortable with a nice fireplace in the middle and play area for kids is not big but my kiss still having fun, overall is a good experience in here
Quick service, great McDonalds quality food. They offer table service here and its great. Messed up my order once, made it right. Very happy with this location.
Great food and free wifi free parking the restaurant has heating making it very cozy to spend time inside it even has a fireplace and sofas.

I have to say just left McDonalds guess someone called in sick. They had the night maintenance man on cashier taking orders best experience ever need to give that boy a raise and put them on the till.

Great McDonalds that has an abundance of power outlets but you cant order food to your table because McDonalds wants to FORCE you to use their app which i refuse to. Guess Im saving money, jokes on McDonalds.
This is the best McDonalds store for the parents with their young kids. We loved the play zone and the craft zone. Im not sure whether the craft zone is temporary though)
I liked there customer service, staff is very friendly. I always like McDonalds for their quick service and hot meals

Its a McDonalds - but a very nice one. Totally modern with electronic order machines, two floors, play place, pop machines on both floors, great views, optional meeting room to rent and the nicest, most helpful McDonalds staff Ive ever dealt with.

McDonalds gets beat up a lot by folks, but lets face it, its delicious. Regardless of if you view it as a pleasure or a guilty pleasure you can rely on this chain to produce tasty food at a moments notice.
It was Halloween day and a lady all dressed up opened the door for me an some other customers wishing us Happy Halloween. I really like this McDonalds restaurant: big, quiet, nice staff...
I go to the drive through everyday. Service is excellent.  Great friendly staff with a good sense of humor .I always leave with a smile or a laugh.
Very busy place during lunch hour. Great location. Fast service. Ace all around.
What she order? FISH FILET. My favorite thing here. Sometimes I get a salad when I feel like eating healthier. My go to place other than Churchs Chicken.
Clean, fast and friendly.  Very nice place, would go back again.
Spacious, clean and has everything! Great place for family get away. We will be back!
Best Mcdonalds, Drive thru in the morning  Is very efficient
Brought my doggy as I was getting my truck serviced across the street they came out and baby sat him for me brought him water wile I order then brought my food out to me too on the patio!! Awesome!
Probably the best McDonalds in the area. The staff is friendly, food is cooked fast and the place itself is pretty cozy. The perfect place for finishing your works leftovers.
Very friendly staff. Made everything fresh with reasonable wait time. Great night crew. Thank you.
The staff are super friendly and helpful.  They consistently go over and above what you would expect from a fast food restaurant

I dont normally go to mcdonalds, but this mcdonalds was awesome!! Its such a relaxing enviroment upstairs. The view is Nice and the food was pretty good! I would go back for sure just for a coffee and to hang out
Still the best for budget eaters, depends on the location and staff attitude, Mc will stay public number one fast food to go!

We came here when it was super busy at around 11:30pm, we were going through the drive through and we were frustrated at first because it was taking a while but the lady at the drive through, Ren, was honestly amazing and so kind to us, even though the environment was clearly very stressful and the person taking our order (another employee) got our order wrong.
